labels.name: automerge
labels.description: Merge the pull request once unit tests and other checks pass.

labels.name: eol
labels.description: End of life. Deprecating support for a previous version.

labels.name: status: blocked
labels.description: Resolving the issue is dependent on other work.

labels.name: needs more info
labels.description: This issue needs more information from the customer to proceed.

labels.name: status: duplicate
labels.description: Duplicate.

labels.name: status: investigating
labels.description: The issue is under investigation, which is determined to be non-trivial.

labels.name: status: will not fix
labels.description: Invalid (untrue/unsound/erroneous), inconsistent with product, not on roadmap.

labels.name: type: bug
labels.description: Error or flaw in code with unintended results or allowing sub-optimal usage patterns.

labels.name: type: cleanup
labels.description: An internal cleanup or hygiene concern.

labels.name: type: feature request
labels.description: ‘Nice-to-have’ improvement, new feature or different behavior or design.

labels.name: type: process
labels.description: A process-related concern. May include testing, release, or the like.

labels.name: type: question
labels.description: Request for information or clarification. Not an issue.

labels.name: priority: p3
labels.description: Desirable enhancement or fix. May not be included in next release.

labels.name: priority: p2
labels.description: Moderately-important priority. Fix may not be included in next release.

labels.name: priority: p1
labels.description: Important issue which blocks shipping the next release. Will be fixed prior to next release.

labels.name: priority: p0
labels.description: Highest priority. Critical issue. P0 implies highest priority.

labels.name: do not merge
labels.description: Indicates a pull request not ready for merge, due to either quality or timing.

labels.name: release blocking
labels.description: Required feature/issue must be fixed prior to next release.

labels.name: needs work
labels.description: This is a pull request that needs a little love.

labels.name: type: docs
labels.description: Improvement to the documentation for an API.

labels.name: :rotating_light:
labels.description: This issue needs some love.

labels.name: triage me
labels.description: I really want to be triaged.

labels.name: semver: major
labels.description: Hint for users that this is an API breaking change.

labels.name: semver: minor
labels.description: A new feature was added.  No breaking changes.

labels.name: semver: patch
labels.description: A minor bug fix or small change.

labels.name: kokoro:run
labels.description: Add this label to force Kokoro to re-run the tests.

labels.name: kokoro:force-run
labels.description: Add this label to force Kokoro to re-run the tests.

labels.name: owlbot:run
labels.description: Add this label to trigger the Owlbot post processor.

labels.name: cla: yes
labels.description: This human has signed the Contributor License Agreement.

labels.name: cla: no
labels.description: This human has *not* signed the Contributor License Agreement.

labels.name: help wanted
labels.description: We'd love to have community involvement on this issue.

labels.name: good first issue
labels.description: This issue is a good place to started contributing to this repository.

labels.name: external
labels.description: This issue is blocked on a bug with the actual product.

labels.name: flakybot: issue
labels.description: An issue filed by the Flaky Bot. Should not be added manually.

labels.name: flakybot: flaky
labels.description: Tells the Flaky Bot not to close or comment on this issue.

labels.name: flakybot: quiet
labels.description: Tells the Flaky Bot to comment less.

labels.name: next major: breaking change
labels.description: this is a change that we should wait to bundle into the next major version

labels.name: samples
labels.description: Issues that are directly related to samples.

labels.name: lang: nodejs
labels.description: Issues specific to JavaScript or TypeScript.

labels.name: lang: ruby
labels.description: Issues specific to Ruby.

labels.name: lang: elixir
labels.description: Issues specific to Elixir.

labels.name: lang: php
labels.description: Issues specific to PHP.

labels.name: lang: python
labels.description: Issues specific to Python.

labels.name: lang: java
labels.description: Issues specific to Java.

labels.name: lang: dotnet
labels.description: Issues specific to .NET.

labels.name: lang: cpp
labels.description: Issues specific to C++.

labels.name: lang: go
labels.description: Issues specific to Go.
